definition: Hengshan County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: An oil tanker drove through Hengshan County, Shaanxi Province, China, Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 一輛油罐車穿行陝西省橫山縣。
